name: Hackquarters
description:
Hackquarters is a startup accelerator and corporate innovation partner
We are bringing together startups and corporate companies to boost more innovation for the universe.

team.name: Gökhan Menge
team.bioHtml: Marketing Manager who has a Computer Engineering degree. Avid technology enthusiast with 10 years of editorial experience. Current interest is in marketing.

jobs.title: Community Manager
jobs.description: In charge of Hackquarters community events in Istanbul, Berlin, London, Dubai.
jobs.descriptionHtml: In charge of Hackquarters community events in Istanbul, Berlin, London, Dubai.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for superstars who can deal with different kinds of Products, including FinTech to IoT, SaaS to B2C. In order to be successful in this role, you should have dealt with governments, investors and large companies and (nice to have experience doing so in different countries.). You love the startup startup scene, and you have actively participated in the development of one. 

People describe you as a good coach, enthusiastic, a go-getter, hardworking, a getting-stuff-done attitude, sharp, and direct. With our support, you work independently to ensure the international programs hit their targets on planning and execution quality.


Digital Marketing Managers will

Day to day execution of accelerator program – You keep the program running, including regular engagement with the companies going through the program, developing program content, understanding critical needs of cohort business and setting objectives for how we can support those objectives

Coordinating internal resources and network outreach – You work closely with cohort companies to understand support and execution requirements that can be fulfilled by the Hackquarters team and then aligning internal teams with cohort needs. You also will be working closely with core members of our extended network to connect the cohort with top advisors and mentors.

Supporting and developing a strong culture within the accelerator – A culture of high performance, collaboration, mutual support as well as a strong focus on results is foundational to our accelerator program
Create documentation for training programs at HQ for international teams. 
Conduct research on the best potential partners in the industry in terms of government institutions, corporates, thought-leaders and technology enablers;

- Creating mailing lists for Wantreprenerus/ Entrepreneurs/ Corporate
- Hackquarters owned channels content strategy & execution
- Possible growth opportunities
- Ownership of Hackquarters' digital presence

jobs.title: Inbound Marketing Specialist
jobs.description:
We are looking for an rockstar inbound marketing specialist to drive us and our startups to the real results.

Job Description 

Campaign generation / implementation
SEO, Keyword research, development & analysis
Content strategy and execution
Become a trusted scale and growth advisor to each of our startups
Actively test and analyze data, content and landing pages to increase ROI and drive incremental volume
Maintain a revenue base by managing account retention and renewal
Creating Landing pages/website updates
 


Requirements 
Experience working in Inbound and Performance marketing thorough understanding of social media for business, including experience with Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn, as well as other emerging social platforms
Hubspot Inbound Certified
Content marketing experience 
Basic HTML/CSS, Photoshop 
Self-starter and Business Owner
